title: 03: Boston Without Hayward
description: Where do the Celtics go from here? Chris, Neil and Kyle are back to discuss what the Gordon Hayward injury means for Boston and more impressions from the NBA's opening night.
itunes:title: 03: Boston Without Hayward
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
